meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Andrea Gilles, Deputy Director, Planning and Urban Development
Arturo Del Castillo, Assistant Director, Planning and Urban Development
Christopher Christian, Director, Code Compliance Services
Cedric Secoundiata, Assistant Director, Code Compliance Services
Ariel Garcia, Administrator, Code Compliance Services
Martine Elyse Philippe, Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Glenn Ayers, Assistant Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care
Holly Holt, Assistant Director, Office of Community Care
Mary Jo Guidice, Director, Dallas Public Library
Heather Lowe, Assistant Director, Dallas Public Library

agenda_items.title: Approval of the August 19, 2024, Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Historic Preservation Update
agenda_items.description: Update on staffing, recent program successes, new historic preservation studies, and upcoming projects.
agenda_items.presenter: Andrea Gilles, Deputy Director, Planning and Urban Development

agenda_items.title: Short-Term Rentals Update
agenda_items.description: Overview of service requests, STR registrations, and ongoing initiatives related to short-term rentals.
agenda_items.presenter: Christopher Christian, Director, Code Compliance Services

agenda_items.title: City Facilities Partners Update - Dallas Theater Center
agenda_items.description: Update on the partnership with Dallas Theater Center and its management of city-owned cultural venues.
agenda_items.presenter: Martine Elyse Philippe, Director, Office of Arts and Culture

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Office of Community Care Agenda Item
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the amendment to the service contract with Senior Citizens of Greater Dallas for the Senior Services Ombudsman Program.
agenda_items.presenter: Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care

agenda_items.title: Proposed Elimination of the Hotspot Loaning Program
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the proposed elimination of the hotspot and laptop lending program.
agenda_items.presenter: Mary Jo Guidice, Director, Dallas Public Library

agenda_items.title: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast of upcoming agenda items for the Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee.

financial_items.description: Amendment to the service contract with Senior Citizens of Greater Dallas for the Senior Services Ombudsman Program
Funding for Dallas Theater Center through Cultural Organizations Program
Proposed elimination of the hotspot loaning program with a total cost of $619,920
